tool_description: Transforms vague experience descriptions into quantified, impact-focused statements with specific metrics and achievements.

experience_descriptions.description: List of current experience bullet points or descriptions

job_role.description: The job title or role these experiences relate to

error_messages: Empty experience list: Provide at least one experience description to quantify.
Insufficient detail: Experience descriptions must contain enough context to suggest meaningful quantification.
Generic descriptions: Provide specific examples rather than vague job responsibilities.
usage: Input your current experience descriptions to receive enhanced versions with quantified achievements, specific metrics, and stronger action verbs.

quantified_experiences.description: Enhanced experience statements with specific numbers, percentages, and measurable outcomes

improvement_score.description: Improvement rating showing enhancement level from 0-100

suggested_metrics.description: Additional metrics or data points to consider including if available
